title: 'Atlanta' Season 3, Episode 3 Recap
description:
Van Lathan and Rembert Browne break down the third episode of ‘Atlanta’ Season 3, ‘The Old Man and the Tree.' They discuss the reactions to the season so far (:48) before digging into a character breakdown of Darius, Paper Boy, Van, and Earn (13:58). Plus, what is it with white girls snatching hats at parties (37:47)?

Hosts: Van Lathan and Rembert Browne
Producer: Donnie Beacham
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
